org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors

Class Outbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors.Outbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Outbox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An outbox holds a collection of send buffers. Each send buffer holds one or more messages, all destined for the same reactor.

    • Constructor Summary

        Buffers a message in the sending reactor for sending later.
